page.title: 02Places of interest
page.content: In and around Newtyle there are some very interesting places to visit.There is{Kinpurnie Tower}which long ago was used as an observatory. It was built by{James McKenzie,Lord Privy Seal of {Scotland.}He was interested in astronomy. {Kinpurnie Castle}Gardens are sometimes open to the public.Other things like the{Keillor Standing {Stone,Privy's Prap and Hatton Castle are all part of Newtyle's History.The Standing Stone has a wolf or bear,a Z- rod and spectacles marked on it.I think it is pre-Christian in age as there is no cross on it.It is to be found at G.R.373398.Privy's Prap was built as a meridianal marker due south from{Belmont Castle.}It too was built by James McKenzie.Privy means private and Prap means stack.(S.Mitchell P7)
